content: Herve Lombaert Hervé Lombaert About Short Bio Calendar Your Visits Research Themes Team Teaching Awards & Funding Team Members Code of Conduct Publications Articles Review Duties Code Talks Canada Research Chair Prof – Research Scientist Polytechnique Montreal – Mila (Currently in Eastern Time) Hiring: (4) PhD, (2) MSc, (1) Postdoc Several topics in Medical Image Analysis: ➤ Shape Analysis for Anatomical Reconstruction ➤ Geometry / Graph / Image / Learning-based algorithms [ more at: https://shape.polymtl.ca/lombaert/jobs.php ] Short Bio Associate Professor (2024 —) @ Polytechnique Montreal. Associate Professor (2017 —) @ ETS Montreal. Assistant Professor / Starting Research Scientist (2015-2017) @ Inria. Starting Research Position— Junior Faculty Position (selective, 5 hires in whole France, for all 8 centers)— Equivalent to Assistant Prof (US) / Lecturer (UK) Postdoc Fellow (2013-2015) @ Microsoft Research–Inria. Postdoc Titles:–Associates often have salaries charged from a grant secured by their mentors–Fellows are often supported by their own fellowships (a 'mini grant') Postdoc Fellow (2012-2013) @ McGill University. Ph.D. (2012) @ Polytechnique Montreal – Siemens – Inria.
